channel.title: Adding NPC Spawns in 667 [THE RIGHT WAY]
channel.description:
Hey, theres already a tut on this around, but in that tut, you hardcode "custom npc" to be spawned on server start. Which doesnt work well and after a while the npc will start being all weird and later it wont pull up CombatDefinitions for the npc.
So, heres the proper way to add npc's to the matrix base:
1. Go to Serverfolder>data>npcs
2. Move the packedSpawns folder to a different location. (i.e Desktop...)
3. Open unpackedSpawnList.txt and add [CODE] 1265 - 3158 9572 0 [/CODE]
1265 is the NPCID, 3158 9572 is the COORDS, 0 is the Z CHOORD a.k.a HEIGHT
4.Place in all the NPCs you want to spawn in the above described way into the "unpackedSpawnList.txt" file.
5.Compile then run your server, your new NPCs are in, but, the old ones are no longer there.
6.Go back to Serverfolder>data>npcs and open the new packedSpawns folder.
7.There should be a new spawn file inside "####.ns" (i.e 1234.ns)
8.Go to the OLD packedSpawns folder we moved earlier and check if there is a spawn file with the same name.
9.If there is no same-named spawn file, copy all the spawnfiles from OLD packedSpawns into the NEW packedSpawns. If there is a file with same name, rename the one in new packedSpawns to a different UNUSED name , which must be numbers only and then copy the spawnfiles from old folder to new one :)
Hope this helps, sorry for bad english, its not my main language :)

item.title: Adding NPC Spawns in 667 [THE RIGHT WAY]
item.dc:creator: @henkkalei henkkalei
item.description:
@henkkalei wrote:

[quote=“ipwnu2day, post:16, topic:436177”][quote author=killer88 link=topic=538900.msg3960147#msg3960147 date=1333209136]
How do u make the npcs stand still?
[/quote]

You will have to add the npc through NPCSpawning.java

The false is telling it not to move, and the true after that I have no clue about it lol.[/quote]

U give him wrong information bro, the false does nothing.
Its the -1, -1 = Walk 0 = Stand still.

And by the way does someone knows how to auto respawn them?

Read full topic

then how do u delete spawns duh… updating spawns is simple as delete packed folder and restart… plus theres 2 more options on list… areaname and ifcan be attacked out that area. areas setted on map folder. It usefull for bosses such as mole as mole lair has over 32ratio tiles.
